cards.desc: Your Move: Your Worker may move into an opponent Worker’s space by forcing their Worker to the space yours just vacated.
cards.name: Apollo

cards.desc: Your Move: Your Worker may move one additional time, but not back to its initial space.
cards.name: Artemis

cards.desc: Opponent’s Turn: If one of your Workers moved up on your last turn, opponent Workers cannot move up this turn.
cards.name: Athena

cards.desc: Your Build: Your Worker may build a dome at any level.
cards.name: Atlas

cards.desc: Your Build: Your Worker may build one additional time, but not on the same space.
cards.name: Demeter

cards.desc: Your Build: Your Worker may build one additional block (not dome) on top of your first block.
cards.name: Hephaestus

cards.desc: Your Move: Your Worker may move into an opponent Worker’s space, if their Worker can be forced one space straight backwards to an unoccupied space at any level.
cards.name: Minotaur

cards.desc: Win Condition: You also win if your Worker moves down two or more levels.
cards.name: Pan

cards.desc: Your Turn: If your Worker does not move up, it may build both before and after moving.
cards.name: Prometheus

cards.desc: Opponent’s Turn: An opponent cannot win by moving into a perimeter space.
cards.name: Hera

cards.desc: Your Build: Your Worker may build one additional time, but this cannot be on a perimeter space.
cards.name: Hestia

cards.desc: Start of Opponent’s Turn: If one of your opponent’s Workers is higher than all of their others, it cannot move.
cards.name: Hypnus

cards.desc: Opponent’s Turn: Opponent Workers cannot build on spaces neighboring your Workers, unless building a dome to create a Complete Tower.
cards.name: Limus

cards.desc: Your Build: Your Worker may build a block under itself.
cards.name: Zeus
